items.name: Component_WebStartBehavior
items.content:
# =================================================================== # # Script: Component_WebStartBehavior # # $$COPYRIGHT$$ # # =================================================================== class Component_WebStartBehavior extends gs.Component_LayoutSceneBehavior ###* * The web-start scene is used if the game has been loaded via mobile webbrowser. That web-start * scene lets the player tap on the screen to start the actual game which is necessary to make * audio-playback working because of browser-security. * * @module gs * @class Component_WebStartBehavior * @extends gs.Component_LayoutSceneBehavior * @memberof gs ### constructor: -> super ###* * Initializes the web-start scene. It just creates a full-screen * DIV layer with a touch event-handler to play a sound if tapped and then switch * to the language-menu / intro-scene to start the actual game. * * @method initialize ### initialize: -> super window.music = new Audio() window.music.src = gs.Application.getPlatformSpecificAudioFilePath("Audio/Sounds/choice_confirm_01") @sound = ResourceManager.getAudioBuffer("Audio/Sounds/choice_confirm_01") @button = jQuery("
") @button.css("position", "absolute") @button.css("left", "0px") @button.css("top", "0px") @button.width(Graphics.width) @button.height(Graphics.height) @button.css("background-color", "transparent") @button.css("z-order", 999999) @button.click (e) => @sound.play() window.music.play() @button.remove() @button = null setTimeout -> SceneManager.switchTo(new gs.Object_Layout("languageMenuLayout")) , 450 @button[0].addEventListener "touchstart", (e) => @sound.play() window.music.play() @button.remove() @button = null SceneManager.switchTo(new gs.Object_Layout("languageMenuLayout")) setTimeout -> window.music.pause() window.music = null SceneManager.switchTo(new gs.Object_Layout("languageMenuLayout")) , 450 jQuery(document.body).append(@button) ###* * Prepares all visual game objects for the scene. * * @method prepareVisual ### prepareVisual: -> super ###* * Prepares all data for the scene and loads the necessary graphic and audio resources. * * @method prepareData ### prepareData: -> super ###* * Update the scene's content. Here you can implement any kind of additional logic * you want. * * @method updateContent ### updateContent: -> super gs.Component_WebStartBehavior = Component_WebStartBehavior
